aws_services: S3 Bucket, EC2, IAM, Security Groups, CloudWatch Logs
background: Production-grade AWS infrastructure deployment in us-west-2 using Terraform. Implements S3 bucket with versioning and encryption, EC2 t3.micro instance with IMDSv2, IAM role with least-privilege S3 read access, Security Group with restricted SSH access, and CloudWatch Logs. All resources follow 'Prod' naming convention and Environment=Production tagging. Single-file architecture (tap_stack.tf) with comprehensive testing (55 unit + 40 integration tests). Enhanced security features include encrypted EBS volumes, public access blocking, and detailed monitoring. Solution aligns with AWS Well-Architected Framework principles for Security, Reliability, Operational Excellence, Performance Efficiency, and Cost Optimization.
author: koushik-turing
